scripts.dev: shx cp env.development .env && (shx cp env.local .env.local 2>nul || echo.) && nodemon server.js
scripts.start:dev: shx cp env.development .env && (shx cp env.local .env.local 2>nul || echo.) && node server.js
scripts.seed: shx cp env.development .env && (shx cp env.local .env.local 2>nul || echo.) && node scripts/seedData.js
scripts.create-admin: shx cp env.development .env && (shx cp env.local .env.local 2>nul || echo.) && node scripts/createAdmin.js
scripts.create-chat-rooms: shx cp env.development .env && (shx cp env.local .env.local 2>nul || echo.) && node scripts/createDefaultChatRooms.js
scripts.dev:windows: shx cp env.development .env && (shx cp env.local .env.local 2>nul || echo.) && nodemon server.js
